Hello, my name is Dylan James McDowell. I am Financial Economics undergraduate with hopes to pursue a graduate degree in Mathematical Statistics with a research focus in Bayesian Methods & Decision Theory. I love coding in [#rstats](https://twitter.com/hashtag/rstats?src=hash) and [#python](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Python?src=hash) and currently am learning Stan. I love to read, write, and have #woahdude deep discussions with friends. Currently, I work as a Junior Data Scientist for a non-profit consulting firm primarily on agronomy projects.
